alert.note: Alert for Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:36PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Wood and northern Hancock Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 635 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McComb, or 10 miles northwest of Findlay, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph with possible rotation. SOURCE...Radar indicated with possible rotation. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fostoria, North Baltimore, McComb, Arcadia, Van Buren, Bradner, Wayne, Bloomdale, Risingsun, Cygnet, Jerry City, Hoytville, West Millgrove and Bairdstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
